CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 16, 1954, pg. 16, reads: "'Aida' Makes Curtain - 'Aida,' presented by the National Negro Opera Foundation, Inc., and its Pittsburgh Opera Guild, at Syria Mosque Saturday night overcame difficulties and answered critics of the effort by giving a commendable performance. It was a tribute to Mme. Mary Dawson, founder and organizer of the NNOF, and her associates..."
TitMainTitle: Two women wearing Egyptian costumes, seated on platform on stage in Syria Mosque for National Negro Opera performance of "Aida"
